entry.source: I am pursuing a demon that has been causing{F801}mischief in the heavens. That monkey has made{F801}a link from the heavens to a cave called{F801}{F804,5}Naraku{F804,0} and escaped into it, where we cannot{F801}track him. I do not care who answers this{F801}request, but I need {F804,5}{F873,1}{F804,0} captured.{F801}
